text:
CWHSSA applies to laborers,
mechanics, guards and “watchmen” for the time spent on covered contract work
only (i.e., total up all time each employee spent working on covered contracts
- exclude all commercial, non-government work). CWHSSA requires the payment of
time and one-half the basic rate of pay for all hours worked in excess of 40
hours in a week. (The daily overtime requirement under CWHSSA was repealed in
1986.)
html: CWHSSA applies to laborers, mechanics, guards and “watchmen” for the time spent on covered contract work only (i.e., total up all time each employee spent working on covered contracts - exclude all commercial, non-government work). CWHSSA requires the payment of time and one-half the basic rate of pay for all hours worked in excess of 40 hours in a week. (The daily overtime requirement under CWHSSA was repealed in 1986.)
